U.S. and admits it took a discussion with an unnamed`` successful'' friend to make him realize it was time to go. He explained on a forthcoming episode of`` Oprah Presents Master Class'': I asked a very successful guy,` What's the best advice you can give me?' and he said,` Simon Cowell , always know when to leave the fair.' And I think that's good advice. Something inside you just says,` You know what, it's time to go.' Without any regrets whatsoever. Despite departing` American Idol', Simon Cowell -- who got engaged to make-up artist Mezhgan Hussainy last year-- insists he has enjoyed being a TV talent show judge because it isn't very difficult.

Mike Pence shuts 1 door, leaves another open U.S. Mike Pence shut the door Thursday on seeking the presidency in 2012 but left unanswered whether his choice instead is the Indiana Eric Holcomb 's office. I'm open to running for Eric Holcomb , Mike Pence said in an exclusive interview with The Indianapolis Star.`` We're going to take the next several months to travel across the state and hear what Hoosiers have to say. We'll seriously consider it.
